code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{Sparkles,BookOpen,Star,BarChart3}from'lucide-react';import'./GoogleSignIn.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GoogleSignIn=()=>{const{user,loading}=useAuth();const googleButtonRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(!user&&!loading&&window.google&&googleButtonRef.current){try{window.google.accounts.id.renderButton(googleButtonRef.current,{theme:'filled_black',size:'large',shape:'rectangular',width:300,text:'signin_with',logo_alignment:'left'});}catch(error){console.error('Error rendering Google Sign-In button:',error);}}},[user,loading]);if(user||loading){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"google-signin",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signin-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Sign In to Get Started"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Sign in with Google to access personalized book recommendations, create reading lists, and track your reading progress."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:googleButtonRef,className:"google-signin-button"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signin-features",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sparkles,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Personalized recommendations"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookOpen,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Reading list management"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Star,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Book ratings and reviews"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChart3,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Reading statistics"})]})]})]})});};export default GoogleSignIn;
